# (PART) Data visualisation {.unnumbered}

# What's in the data visualisation FAQ?

Questions related to:

- **base R plot** (e.g. `plot()`, `curve()`, `boxplot()`); or 
- **`ggplot2`** (e.g. `geom_point()`, `stat_function()`, `theme()`) will be documented and answered here.

This section may also answer common questions about finding an appropriate visualisation for different types of data.

```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(iris, aes(Petal.Length, Petal.Width)) +
  geom_point(aes(colour = Species)) +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", colour = "black", size = .6) +
  ggtitle("Relationship between petal length and petal width in iris") +
  xlab("Petal Length (cm)") +
  ylab("Petal Width (cm)") +
  scale_colour_viridis_d() +
  theme_classic()
```
